name: NumbNutZ: Wizard's Apprentice
description:
Embark on a journey for understanding and revenge as NumbNutZ to explore the temples that lie in the forest, and beyond in this 2D action-adventure. Avoid the traps and monsters that guard these temples and learn more about who is behind your village destruction and the death of your wife from the bosses that guard each temple. Hear the bosses’ hints as to who kidnapped your master as you face their massive power and draw ever closer to the question that sits firmly in NumbNutZ mind…” Why?”

Warning: This game contains mature language throughout. 

This is a 2D Pixelated Game: Recommendations are to run it at 1440 x 900 when prompted.
